page.title: 15THE LIBRARY ,SOUTH SHIELDS
page.content:
The main library in South Shields is housed in a bright, new building. It has a wide range of services.
There are seven different sections: fiction,non-fiction,reference, a very good local history library, children's library (with purpose built room where competitions, quizzes, story-telling and holiday activities are held), a music library and a service for the housebound. There are video tapes stocked on VHS and Betamax cassettes covering feature films, educational and instructional programmes. At the entrance is an information for tourists and local residents.
